synopsis.text: After defeating Majin Buu, Goku and his friends are living peaceful lives on Earth when Beerus, the God of Destruction, awakens from his long slumber. Beerus has heard rumors of a Saiyan warrior named Goku who defeated Frieza, so he seeks out Goku to fight him. Excited by the prospect of a worthy opponent, Goku challenges Beerus but is easily defeated. Realizing the immense power Beerus possesses and the danger he poses to the universe, Goku and his allies summon the dragon Shenron to learn the secret of the Super Saiyan God transformation. After achieving this new form, Goku engages Beerus again in an intense battle that threatens the Earth. Ultimately, Goku and his friends must find a way to stop the destructive Beerus before he can obliterate their planet and potentially the entire universe.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
